title: Physically-Grounded Manifold Projection Model for Generalizable Metal Artifact Reduction in Dental CBCT
summary: Metal artifacts in Dental CBCT severely obscure anatomical structures, hindering diagnosis. Current deep learning for Metal Artifact Reduction (MAR) faces limitations: supervised methods suffer from spectral blurring due to "regression-to-the-mean", while unsupervised ones risk structural hallucinations.
